readable.title: 2101128963_fdf8b2a0d7
readable.content: A baseball is recoiling from an action taken on a treated field watched by others . A baseball player on a playing field springs into action . A baseball player standing on the mound . A Philadelphia Phillie pitcher on the pitchers mound with his left leg up behind him . A pitcher in a red and white uniform in a baseball game has just thrown the ball .
